title: 'The Expanse' at 10: the outer space drama that should have been as big as 'Game of Thrones'
description: It's one of the 21st century's best sci-fi shows. If only "The Expanse" had found the audience it deserved.
content: It's one of the 21st century's best sci-fi shows. If only "The Expanse" had found the audience it deserved.
